assetsDeclared2019: Assets declared by the candidate in 2019
assetsDeclared2024: Assets declared by the candidate in 2024
candidateRelativeWealth: The wealth of the candidate relative to other candidates in the dataset.
mpDiffAvailability: This MP's data has different availability
mpRepresentsGovernment: This MP was a minister. Ministers represent the government in parliament, so their participation is not reported.
declaredCriminalCases2019: Declared criminal cases as per 2019 affidavit
declaredAssetsNineteen: Declared value of assets owned as per 2019 affidavit
declaredAssetsTwentyFour: Declared value of assets owned as per 2024 affidavit
netaDetails20192024:
Neta details from 2019 and 2024 election affidavits (MyNeta). Parliament activity from
				2019-2024 Lok Sabha sessions (PRS India).
mlaCandidatesDeclaredItems:

listOfAffidavitsApril24: List including only individuals who filed affidavits as of April 24th, 2024
aboutOne: This is a small project made as part of the April 2024
electionAffidavits20192024:
Election affidavits filed by candidates during the 2019 and 2024 general elections
				from MyNeta. Legislative activity of representatives in the 17th Lok Sabha (2019-2024) from PRS
				India.
aboutTwo:
Data on age, attendance and questions is from PRS India. Other data is from MyNeta, as per
				2019 and 2024 (where available) election affidavits. Attendance shown is the average
				attendance percentage across parliamentary sessions where the neta's attendance was tracked.
